name: Neopets - Sonic the Hedgehog Theme
description: My first theme. Made originally for personal use, but figured others might want it. Looks best with Adblock installed. Also removes the Nickelodeon bar at the top of pages.
additional_info: UPDATED 06/12/2012: changed header banner in accordance to new neopets header removing "pet central" and adding "premium"; will update other themes in time If you like my themes, please consider following me on Twitter. I can be found on Neopets as arkurrd. Feel free to send me a NM with theme suggestions!
